title: subsumed in the additional amenities & facilities to be provided under DRP as in clause no
clause_text: subsumed in the additional amenities & facilities to be provided under DRP as in clause no. 7.1 above as per the specifications of DRP (SRA) or the concerned Govt. authority and shall be handed over free of cost and charge to the DRP (SRA) or the concerned Govt. authority. The land area under such reservation shall be allowed to be included in the project plot area to be considered for FSI purpose.
